0: spa was lovely staff great comped breakfast because of isuesroms need some maintenance
This location is within easy walking distance of the Convention Center which was the hub of our activities
The indoor pool and gym were great
Nice hotel for Chattanooga situated in a central location close to most activities
But the pool and exercise center were clean and up to date
In between we ate and drank at the wonderful restaurant and friendly bar area and even got in a few games of pool in the rec area
The staff at the spa was awesome
1: Trying to not trip on carpet that is sticking up throughout the hotel is like a local obstacle course
The gym needs updated equipment that actually work
Pool and spa on 2nd floor translates normally quiet end of hall room into loud entrance for half the hotel to access recreation
Though the spa was really a corned off area near the changing areas for the pool and gym
There is a workout room and a gym as part of the spa that guests have access to from 60 am to 10 pm there is also an on site parking garage with self parking and valet service
fitness center in construction was only criticism
The fitness center was n’t really a fitness center just a room on the first floor with some weights a bench treadmill and cycling machine
The sauna advertised online was very disappointing
The only thing that did not live up to expectations was the sauna in the spa did not work and was very small for one maybe two people
The gym is small as a closet
